node.title: 'Why did you do this?': Man stabbed in the eye during brutal attack confronts teen attacker in court
node.alt: a man a young girl in a small coin operated car
node.description: Brett Halcro, who was stabbed in the eye during an unprovoked assault in Sydney last year, sobs in court as he confronts one of his teenage attackers.
node.content:
["A man who was stabbed in the eye during an assault in Sydney last year has sobbed in court while\u00a0confronting\u00a0one of his teenage\u00a0attackers, asking: \"Why did you do this?\"\u00a0", "Brett Halcro, 37, remains haunted by the moment he was set upon by a group of teenagers in the inner-city suburb of Pyrmont on July 31, 2020.", "He was beaten unconscious by the gang, which had been partying at a nearby apartment before one teen, then 16, used a knife to slash at Mr Halcro's face and pierce his right eye.", "That boy, now aged 17, faced a sentence hearing before the NSW District Court today where Mr Halcro gave a tearful victim impact statement, describing how the attack changed his life.", "The father-of-one wore a medical patch over his eye and sobbed in the witness box as he told the court he moved from Melbourne to Sydney to help his father.", "He had been in town only a few months before the attack.", "", "
The brutal assault in July sent shockwaves across the Sydney community.(ABC News)
", "He had been on a night out watching football at a Pyrmont venue before he was bashed a few blocks away as he walked below the Wattle Crescent apartment the teens had hired for a party.", "The court heard Mr Halcro had only five\u00a0per cent vision in his injured eye, which could become completely blind.", "He had also lost hearing in his right ear after being repeatedly kicked in the head\u00a0and is in constant pain from a misaligned spine sustained in the attack.", "\"These injuries will affect my future employment, my livelihood, what makes me 'me',\" Mr Halcro told the court.", "Mr Halcro said he had struggled with the trauma of the incident and his lengthy recovery in hospital.", "", "
Pyrmont stabbing victim Brett Halcro during \"happier times\".(Supplied)
", "He said the young daughter he hasn't seen in almost two years was \"the reason why I keep going\", he said.", "\"I have tried to make sense of this \u2026\u00a0sometimes the only reason I wake up is for my daughter,\" he said.", "\"Why did you do this?\"", "Judge Robert Sutherland stepped in to finish Mr Halcro's statement after he was overcome with emotion.", "The boy, who cannot be identified, watched on via video link from a youth prison and faces years behind bars.", "He has pleaded guilty to charges including assault occasioning actual bodily harm and causing grievous bodily harm with intent.", "The hearing continues."]
